channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Countryfile
channel.desc: It's International Women's Day, and the team are in Somerset on the Holnicote Estate. Anita Rani meets Holly Purdley who farms with a baby on her back and her three year old as her farmhand. She's part of a local `Women in Farming' group, which aims to reduce the isolation often felt by women who live and work on farms.
